docs.text:
Introduction


You can use Query to filter and select from a $DataFrame$:


using Query
using DataFrames
using NamedTuples

df = DataFrame(name=[
John
, 
Sally
, 
Kirk
], age=[23., 42., 59.], children=[3,5,2])

x = @from i in df begin
    @where i.age
30. 
 i.children 
 2
    @select @NT(Name=
lowercase(i.name))
    @collect DataFrame
end

println(x)

# output

3
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text:
You can use Query to filter and select from a $DataFrame$:  using Query
using DataFrames
using NamedTuples

df = DataFrame(name=[ John ,  Sally ,  Kirk ], age=[23., 42., 59.], children=[3,5,2])

x = @from i in df begin
    @where i.age 30.   i.children   2
    @select @NT(Name= lowercase(i.name))
    @collect DataFrame
end

println(x)

# output

3
